entry.title: Go all the way
entry.content:
Your life is your life .
Don’t let it be close down the thing so machine.
Be on the watch.
Their are way’s out.
There’s reals a light somewhere.
It may not be much light.
But, it be see out the nights.
Be on the watch.
The god will left you chances.
Know them, clear them.
You can be death, but you can’t be death-in-life, sometime.
And more of you learn to do it, the more light their will be.

Your life is your life .
Know it when you have it.
You are marvelous.
The god wait to do lives and you.

If you going to try,
Go on the way.
Otherwise, don’t even start.
If you going to try,
Go all the way.
It’s could be losing girl friend, wives, projects, jobs, and may be your mind.
Go all the way.
It could mean not eating a three or four days.
It could mean freezing on a park bench.
It could mean cell.
It could mean derision, mockery, isolation.
Isolation is gift, for the others to retest your endurance, of how mach you really want do it, and you do it.
Despite rejection, and work hards.
And they will be better but anything else you can imagine.

If you going to try.
Go all the way.
There is no other feeling like that.
You will be alone with gods.
And the night who clear with the fire.
Do it, do it, do it, do it.
Go on the way.
Go on the way.

Your will life stream perfect laughter.
It’s only good truncheon there is.
